definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: He gave all these people these bad rules.
sentences.chinese: 他給人們下達邪惡的指令。

sentences.english: Now you need to explicitly run the action from the context menu.
sentences.chinese: 現在你需要在上下文菜單裏明確地執行這一指令。

sentences.english: Direct the DSAS's microphone towards the source of sound.
sentences.chinese: 指令員的麥克風對源頭的聲音。

sentences.english: They are harried, sending out instructions to companies and schools.
sentences.chinese: 他們苦惱不已，不斷向公司和學校發出各種指令。

sentences.english: We compile the instruction list of AWCDPR by the method of sequence control.
sentences.chinese: 採用順序控制編程方法編寫搶答器的指令表程序。

sentences.english: Every general-purpose computer has its own unique instruction repertoire.
sentences.chinese: 每臺通用計算機都有其獨有的指令系統。

sentences.english: It also makes it much easier to do instruction scheduling for unrolled loops.
sentences.chinese: 它還簡化了對於展開循環進行的指令調度。

sentences.english: Mechanic will proceed to the fire pumps rooms to stand by and await further instruction.
sentences.chinese: 機械工應在消防水泵房內待命，等候進一步的指令。

sentences.english: Some programs, such as script applications, do not have their own processes.
sentences.chinese: 某些像是指令碼應用程式並未擁有自己的處理序。

sentences.english: It is the clearest possible directive to Gaddafi and his cohorts to end the killing.
sentences.chinese: 這是要求卡扎菲和同夥結束殺戮最爲明確的一項指令。

sentences.english: It can be thought of as an instruction to a policy processing infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 對於策略處理基礎架構來說，可以將其看作一條指令。

sentences.english: Jack then has Lauren break his handcuffs with a pair of bolt cutters.
sentences.chinese: 然後，傑克指令蘿倫用一把斷線鉗剪斷了他的手銬。

sentences.english: Set this key to the command used to create thumbnails for themes.
sentences.chinese: 本設定鍵的內容是爲佈景主題製作縮圖所用的指令。

sentences.english: Then they returned to the orbiting command module and started back to earth.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們返回繞月軌道上的指令艙，開始返回地球。

sentences.english: How to use the fuzzy temperature control command, FTC?
sentences.chinese: 如何使用FTC模糊溫度控制指令？

sentences.english: Then Gaines has Jack place a small object in his ear.
sentences.chinese: 然後，蓋恩斯指令傑克將一個小物件放入他的耳朵中。

definition: to transmit down (a chain of command)/to pass down (to lower level)/to issue/to send through
oral command/a word of command (used in drilling troops or gymnasts)/password (used by sentry)
reception (of transmitted signal)/to receive/to accept/to admit/to take over (e.g. a factory)/to expropriate
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to dispatch (vehicles, staff etc)/to schedule/to manage/dispatcher/scheduler
to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
